title: Laptop freezes everytime i log in?
body: everytime i log onto league and go to the homepage it just freezes, cant move my mouse cant do anything it just freezes my entire laptop and i have to manually restart it. just wondered if anyone has encountered the same problem and has any tips?

replies.body:
ive been having same issue
i just leave it for 5 minutes or so then it starts working .but doesnt connect to chat

WHAREPAKU Nooooooooo-

Can't let this keep happening to peeps (esp one of the bros!)

Seems to be happening to alot of windows users after 5.5 came out I managed to fix the freezing issue by doing the following:

→ Right click your league of legends .exe
→ Properties
→ Compatibility
→ Tick ' Run this computer in compatibility for: '
→ Select your operating system from the dropdown

(not sure if this will fix your chat issue so let me know)

- If you're confused as to how i know you - I was previously Hym :)

Hope that works bro!

I recommend repairing the LoL files by clicking the question mark help button  before you log in and click repair (takes a long time).

Last resort would be to uninstall and re download LoL.

If your PC is freezing not just because of LoL, would be worth running a virus scan, a PC cleaner such as CrapCleaner, and as a last resort restore your PC to factory settings.
